      • indirectIncomings

        public static Collection<org.eclipse.uml2.uml.Transition> indirectIncomings(org.eclipse.uml2.uml.State state)
        Returns:
        The set of all transitions ending indirectly on the state. This is, those which end on one of the state's entry points.

      • indirectOutgoings

      • moveContents

        public static void moveContents(org.eclipse.uml2.uml.Region targetRegion,
                                org.eclipse.uml2.uml.State source)
        Adds all the inner elements of a composite state to self, except for the initial, entry, exit and history pseudo-states. This operation moves those elements, as it removes them from their original container and sets their owner to the recipient.

      • initialState

      • boundPackageRef

        public static org.eclipse.uml2.uml.Package boundPackageRef(org.eclipse.uml2.uml.Type actual)
        Return the bound package in the context of template instantiation for a given actual. This is required by the state machine template which needs to access operation IDs provided by the call interceptor.
        Parameters:
        actual - The actual for template binding
        Returns:

      • declareDependencyToOperationIDs

        public static void declareDependencyToOperationIDs(org.eclipse.uml2.uml.Package pkg)
        Declares a dependency from the current classifier which is produced by template instantiation to the element (enum) "OperationIDs", if found within the passed package.
        Parameters:
        pkg -

      • declareDependencyToSignalIDs

        public static void declareDependencyToSignalIDs(org.eclipse.uml2.uml.Package pkg)
        Declares a dependency from the current classifier which is produced by template instantiation to the element (enum) "SignalIDs", if found within the passed package.
        Parameters:
        pkg - the package in which an enumeration is looked up
